c:complexType.name: ColorAxis
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the color axis.
A color axis panel and its properties can be referred to in several ways, in order of precedence:
By full id
the id of the axis is the word color, followed by it's index (when >= 2), and terminated by the word Axis.
(ex: colorAxis, color2Axis, color3Axis, ...)
By the single word color, when it is the first one
to make it easier to specify the properties of the most used color axis - the first one - it can be referred to without the suffix Axis, resulting in the name color.
Without id, when it is the first one, for legend properties and the colors property
Legend related properties of the first axis can be referred to directly, without the axis id. The same applies to the property colors.
As an example, the name of the property legendDrawLine can be used directly, instead of its full name: colorLegendDrawLine.
For color axes other than the first, the legend properties still need to be referred to with its full name, like in: color2AxisLegendDrawLine.
The domain of color axes is evaluated at the root chart level. When in a small multiples chart, colors are shared among small charts.
Color axes map values of the "color" visual role.

c:property.name: transform
c:property.c:documentation:
The color transform function.
Allows applying an effect to the colors that an axis outputs.
The default value is null except for color axes that are used only by one of the trend or plot2 plots, and whose colors property was not specified. In these cases, the default value is pvc.brighterColorTransform.

c:property.name: colors
c:property.c:documentation:
The colors of a color axis.
It can be a single color as documented in or a single protovis color object (like: pv.color('red') or pv.Color.names.blueviolet).
Additionally, an array of color strings or protovis colors can be specified.
If a function is specified, it can be:
a protovis scale, like the one obtained by: pv.colors('red', 'blueviolet')
a scale factory - a function that given the domain values as arguments return a protovis color scale

When a color role is optional and was not specified, but color is still required to show visual elements, this property allows specifying the color with which all visual elements' color attributes will be based on.

c:property.c:documentation:
Indicates if the color map obtained in the first render is to be preserved or not, regardless if it was given in or if the default was applied.

c:property.name: normByCategory
c:property.c:documentation:
A separate scale is used for each category.
This property is currently only supported by the .

c:property.c:documentation:
How much a last sibling slice will be brighter than a first sibling slice.

c:facetType.name: DiscreteColorAxisMapFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the discrete color axes map facet.

c:property.name: map
c:property.c:documentation:
Allows reserving colors to certain color scale keys.
Color scale keys are the values of the color role. By default, the color role is bound to the dimensions of the series role. Color scale keys that are not mapped, receive colors taken from . Colors in that are also present in the color map are ignored.
Assuming the color role is bound to the grouping "territory, country", the following map would reserve the colors red and green to Canada and Portugal, respectively:
chartOptions.colorMap = { "NA~Canada": "red", "EMEA~Portugal": "green" };
Assumes that the default is used.

c:facetType.name: DiscreteColorAxisLegendFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the discrete color axes legend facet.

c:property.name: legendVisible
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the legend items of the color axis should be visible (applies to color axes of discrete domain).

c:property.name: legendDrawLine
c:property.c:documentation:
Forces a rule to be shown or not in the marker zone (applies to color axes of discrete domain).
The default value depends on the chart type.

c:property.name: legendDrawMarker
c:property.c:documentation:
Forces a shape to be shown or not in the marker zone (applies to color axes of discrete domain).
The default value depends on the chart type.

c:property.name: legendShape
c:property.c:documentation:
Forces a given shape to be used in the marker zone (applies to color axes of discrete domain).
The default value depends on the chart type.

c:property.name: legendClickMode
c:property.c:documentation:
What happens when the user clicks a legend item (applies to color axes of discrete domain).
Note that when
is true, the legend item marker will be hoverable.
When is true, the legend item marker will be selectable, whatever the value of this property is. In that case, only the label part of the legend marker, will respect this property.

c:facetType.name: NumericColorAxisFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the numeric color axes facet.

c:property.name: scaleType
c:property.c:documentation: The type of scale to use, in what concerns the range of the scale (applies to numeric domain axes).

c:property.name: useAbs
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the axis scale is applied over the absolute value of the domain values (applies to numeric domain axes).

c:property.name: domain
c:property.c:documentation:
The domain values (applies to numeric domain axes).
This option is ignored when option normByCategory is specified. In that case, an automatically determined domain is used per existing category.

c:property.name: min
c:property.c:documentation: The minimum color (applies to numeric domain axes).

c:property.name: max
c:property.c:documentation: The maximum color (applies to numeric domain axes).

c:property.name: missing
c:property.c:documentation:
The color used for a null domain value (applies to numeric domain axes).
The default value is this color.
